articles.author: Claire Jones
articles.title: Federal Reserve officials were open to further US rate rises to quell inflation - Financial Times
articles.description: Hawkish signals from some central bank members came before recent data pointing to cooling price pressures
articles.content: Some US Federal Reserve officials signalled they would be prepared to raise interest rates further if inflation became more aggressive, according to a record of their last meeting at the start of May… [+2430 chars]

articles.author: Clara Denina, Felix Njini
articles.title: Anglo leaves door open to engage with BHP after spurning third offer - Reuters
articles.description: Anglo American has agreed to a one-week extension for BHP Group to make a binding takeover offer, it said on Wednesday, after rejecting a third proposal from its rival that valued it at 38.6 billion pounds ($49.18 billion).

articles.title: Taylor Swift and Olympics ticket scams fuel 2024 fraud - BBC.com
articles.description: Money lost to fraud fell last year, but purchase and romance scams are on the rise.
articles.content:
Charlotte Edwards,Business reporter
Fake Olympics and Taylor Swift tickets are the two biggest online scams consumers are likely to encounter this year, UK Finance has warned.
